member.name: T:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IColumn
member.summary: Defines DataTables column members.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IColumn.Name
member.summary: Gets column name.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IColumn.Field
member.summary: Gets column field.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IColumn.IsSearchable
member.summary: Gets column searchable indicator.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IColumn.Search
member.summary: Gets column search definition or null if column is not searchable.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IColumn.IsSortable
member.summary: Gets column sortable indicator.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IColumn.Sort
member.summary: Gets column sort definition or null if column is not sortable.

member.name: M:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IColumn.SetSort(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Sets column sort definition.
member.returns: True if sort could be set, False otherwise.

member.name: T:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IDataTablesRequest
member.summary: Defined a DataTables request.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IDataTablesRequest.Draw
member.summary: Gets draw counter. This is used by DataTables to ensure that the Ajax returns from server-side procesing request are drawn in sequence by DataTables. Ajax requests are asynchronous and thus can return out of sequence. This is used as part of the 'Draw' return parameter.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IDataTablesRequest.Start
member.summary: Gets paging first record indicator. This is the start point in the current data set (zero index based).

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IDataTablesRequest.Length
member.summary: Gets the number of records that the table can display in the current draw. It is expected that the number of records returned will be equal to this number, unless the server has fewer records to return. Note that this can be -1 to indicate that all records should be returned (although that negates any benefits of server-side processing!).

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IDataTablesRequest.Search
member.summary: Gets global search. To be applied to all searchable columns.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IDataTablesRequest.Columns
member.summary: Gets DataTables column collection (from client-side).

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IDataTablesRequest.AdditionalParameters
member.summary: Gets the user-defined collection of parameters.

member.name: T:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IDataTablesResponse
member.summary: Defines a DataTables response.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IDataTablesResponse.Draw
member.summary: Gets draw counter.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IDataTablesResponse.TotalRecords
member.summary: Gets total records counter.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IDataTablesResponse.TotalRecordsFiltered
member.summary: Gets total filtered records counter.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IDataTablesResponse.Data
member.summary: Gets data for the response.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IDataTablesResponse.Error
member.summary: Gets the error message.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IDataTablesResponse.AdditionalParameters
member.summary: Gets aditional parameters to send back to the client-side.

member.name: T:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IOptions
member.summary: Defines DataTables option members and methods.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IOptions.DefaultPageLength
member.summary: Gets the default page length.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IOptions.IsDrawValidationEnabled
member.summary: Gets the indicator whether draw validation is enabled or not.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IOptions.IsRequestAdditionalParametersEnabled
member.summary: Gets the indicator whether aditional request parameters parsing is enabled or not.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IOptions.IsResponseAdditionalParametersEnabled
member.summary: Gets the indicator whether aditional response parameters parsing is enabled or not.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IOptions.RequestNameConvention
member.summary: Gets request name conventions.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IOptions.ResponseNameConvention
member.summary: Gets response name conventions.

member.name: M:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IOptions.SetDefaultPageLength(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets default page length.

member.name: M:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IOptions.EnableDrawValidation
member.summary: Enables draw validation. Draw validation is enabled by default.

member.name: M:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IOptions.DisableDrawValidation
member.summary: Disables draw validation.

member.name: M:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IOptions.EnableRequestAdditionalParameters
member.summary: Enables request aditional parameter parsing. You must also provide your own custom parsing function on registration.

member.name: M:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IOptions.DisableRequestAdditionalParameters
member.summary: Disables request aditional parameter parsing.

member.name: M:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IOptions.EnableResponseAdditionalParameters
member.summary: Enables response aditional parameter parsing.

member.name: M:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IOptions.DisableResponseAdditionalParameters
member.summary: Disables response aditional parameter parsing.

member.name: M:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IOptions.UseCamelCase
member.summary: Forces DataTables to use CamelCase naming convention. CamelCase is enabled by default.

member.name: M:DataTables.AspNet.Core.IOptions.UseHungarianNotation
member.summary: Forces DataTables to use HungarianNotation naming convention. HungarianNotation is available for compatibility with older DataTables (prior to 1.10).

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.ISearch.Value
member.summary: Search value.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.ISearch.IsRegex
member.summary: Flag to indicate if the search term for this column should be treated as regular expression (true) or not (false). Normally server-side processing scripts will not perform regular expression searching for performance reasons on large data sets, but it is technically possible and at the discretion of your script.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.ISort.Order
member.summary: Indicates the sort order for composed (multi) sorting.

member.name: P:DataTables.AspNet.Core.ISort.Direction
member.summary: Ordering direction for this column. It will be 'Ascending' or 'Descending' to indicate ordering direction.

member.name: T:DataTables.AspNet.Core.SortDirection
member.summary: Defines directions for column sorting.

member.name: F:DataTables.AspNet.Core.SortDirection.Ascending
member.summary: Represents an ascendant sorting (default).

member.name: F:DataTables.AspNet.Core.SortDirection.Descending
member.summary: Represents a descendant sorting.

member.summary: Gets template for each column search value.

member.summary: Gets template for each column search regex indicator.
